title: Pocahontas
creator_credit: Eric Goldberg, Mike Gabriel, James Pentecost and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: The legendary tale of the meeting of Pocahontas, American Indian Princess, and Captain John Smith is vividly recreated with the Disney recipe for success; two cheeky animal companions, the racoon Meeko and hummingbird Flit, vibrant colours and captivating music. A film for the family to enjoy as Pocahontas learns to listen to her heart. Features the Academy Award winning score of Alan Menken and Stephen Schwartz. Featuring the voices of Mel Gibson, Irene Bedard, Judy Kuhn, David Ogden Stiers, Linda Hunt, Christian Bale, John Kassir, Billy Connolly.
